businesses.name: iTandCoffee
businesses.business_details:
iTandCoffee was in founded in 2012 – at the time focussing on helping women in the local community learn to use their iPad, iPhones and Macs. We realised very quickly that our services had broader appeal, to anyone in need of patient, relaxed and jargon-free help with technology. 

Our aim is to empower you through your technology, not just fix your problem and leave you
wondering what we did! We are experts in all things Apple, Microsoft Office, Windows, Office 365, iCloud (and other ‘clouds’), business technology services and tools, and more.

We’ll help you discover that you CAN DO IT.
businesses.product_details: At iTandCoffee, you'll find a welcoming smile, a relaxed cup of tea or coffee, and a genuine enthusiasm for helping you to gain the confidence to use and enjoy your personal technology. Our technology classes, appointments, guides and videos are jargon-free and paced to suit you. If you can't come to our beautiful, welcoming iTandCoffee premises in Camberwell, we can come to you. And we can help anyone anywhere using our remote support and training service.
businesses.new_products:
- Remote support and training (previously only offered to a limited number of clients) – on any tech topic. We can help with Windows, Mac, iPhone, iPad.
- Updated trading hours during COVID-19 crisis: Weekday 8:30 – 6pm, with limited weekend appointments also available.
- Remote classes (previously not offered) – examples of our online classes include getting started on Zoom for personal or business use, getting to know your Mac and keeping kids safe on iPads, iPhones, Mac and Windows.
- We are looking to also start regular ‘PTT Sessions’ – like a daily PT session for your fitness, except we will focus on your Personal Tech Training, covering topics that we know our clients want to learn about. These PTT sessions will be 30 min online sessions offered at the same time each day, with a video recording that can be watched in you miss the daily fix! We are currently taking registrations of interest in this new service, so that we can see if we have enough people to proceed. Here’s the link for anyone wanting to register: https://form.jotform.com/itandcoffee/interest-in-ptt-sessions
businesses.headline: Empowering you through your technology – patient, friendly and expert tech support and training
